about_the_game:
**Game Update and Improved Features**

Dear players and supporters,

I want to express my sincere gratitude for your patience and understanding during the initial delay of my game’s launch. As a solo developer, I faced many unique challenges, including limited resources and time constraints. However, I firmly believe that quality should never be compromised, and I dedicated every available moment to enhancing the game.

The Good News: Dramatic Improvements!

I’m thrilled to announce that the past several months has been very transformative. The game now boasts significant enhancements across various aspects, including gameplay mechanics, modes, graphics, and overall performance. Your feedback has been invaluable, and I’ve taken it to heart to take extra time to improve the gameplay and work towards a successful launch. We have been actively testing the game online and are making major progress towards the early access release.

*Features*

True Third-Person Perspective:

See the Action Unfold: Dive into intense firefights from a dynamic third-person viewpoint. Whether you’re sprinting, crouching, proning, leaning, climbing, rolling, flying, riding, driving, sky diving or parachuting, the third-person perspective puts you right in the heart of the battle.

Dedicated Servers:
Seamless Multiplayer: Our game runs on robust dedicated servers, ensuring smooth gameplay, minimal lag and large player counts all across the globe.

-A MASSIVE 1,400 square mile sand box with nearly two dozen conquerable islands that is slated to support up to 200 concurrent players in single server. This sandbox mode features a dynamic day/night cycle and will act as a free-roam objective-based domination game mode with the full feature set of various aircraft, vehicles, boats and equipment to traverse the vast area.

-18 different drivable aircraft, tanks, vehicles and boats await your specific gameplay preferences. All with various different weapons and damage profiles, featuring munitions crate loading and unloading, aircraft refueling, ammunition reloading, passenger support, fast roping, sky diving, explosive projectiles, missiles, rockets, miniguns, machine guns, cannons and more.

-Over a dozen different player weapons with various different optics and suppressor options with individual damage and ballistic profiles. Anti-tank projectiles, fragmentation grenades, claymores, smoke grenades, Mk-19 automatic grenade launchers with many more weapons planned to be added in future updates.

-The game modes will include Domination, Team deathmatch, Deathmatch, Elimination as well as our newest flagship mode: Phase Line— with epic battles that should support up to 100 v 100. Team Deathmatch and Elimination support 12 v 12 with Deathmatch supporting up to 24 individual players.

Many of us are familiar with some of the traditional game modes available in Phase Line: Raider Assault, but I want to take a moment to emphasize the newest signature game mode Phase Line.

**Phase Line Mode**

Here's how it works:

-Teams vie for control of a mobile flag that shifts the front line. The flag bearer becomes the moving front line. The teams support the flag bearer in an effort to move the front line to the enemy phase line.

-Once the flag reaches the enemy’s phase line, a capture objective appears. Your team must capture it to secure victory.

-Dropping the flag halts objective progress. To continue, the flag must be picked up and moved past the enemy phase line to continue to capture the enemy objective.

-Players dynamically respawn behind the moving frontline on their respective team's side ensuring the battle continues to rage on and opposition is always nearby.

-Each team receives two highly important command trucks. These mobile bases spawn vehicles and outposts with munitions caches and Mk-19 automatic grenade launchers. These are critical for defense, offense and your team's overall success. Protect them.

-Finite Resources: Choose wisely—there’s a limit to the vehicles you can deploy.

-Frontline Tactics: Command trucks are lifelines. Use them strategically to move troops back to the battle, provide essential equipment and keep your team in play.

-Team effort and strategy are paramount to the success of your team's victory. This mode is designed to be played as a 360-degree security head-on-a-swivel strategy. Teams must play defense and offense in tandem to secure victory. Slip up and the enemy will run through your team and capture your objective.

-Feel your contribution to the collective effort: An individual player can have a dramatic effect on the battlefield. By eliminating enemy offense, capturing the objective or being responsible for moving the frontline for the entire team, your role will be vital and seen in the overall mission.

Phase Line: Raider Assault isn’t just a singular game; it’s vastly encompassing online multiplayer battle experience from the individual all the way up to the team effort. A multitude of mechanics, aircraft, vehicles and strategies exist to create a winning formula. Alliances are forged, strategies are tested, and legends are born. Rally your troops, capture the objective, and secure the win.

Are you ready to claim victory? Wishlist today!

content_descriptors.notes: This game will contain a moderate amount of gameplay that includes the use of weapons and the display of blood.

movies.name: Phase Line: Raider Assault Gameplay Trailer

name: Phase Line: Raider Assault

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 or Intel® Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 or Intel® Core i7
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Phase Line: Raider Assault is a TPS where players can engage in tactical warfare with intense small to large online PvP battles. Coordinate with your team or fight solo. Be a grunt, fly aircraft or drive vehicles while executing military strategies and dominate the battlefield!
